titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: This is an artificial collection created by HSP staff, containing manuscript materials from many sources. This extensive collection is arranged alphabetically. Most of the papers pertain to individuals although some are grouped by organization or other group category. Material consists of correspondence written by the individual, legal and formal documents, such as indentures and marriage and draft exemption certificates and/or printed material, such as broadsides. The individuals in this collection represent a broad range of fields, such as medicine, religion, diplomacy, the military, and the arts. In addition to people of local and national prominence, this collection also includes foreign individuals.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
